title: SIMOC
description: SIMOC is built to be an educational tool used in the classroom to teach students about what it takes to keep humans alive off-world. Using a combination of real-world data and artificial simulation to create user created scenarios. SIMOC will be published through the National Geographic Society later this year. I was initially part of the original student team, I continued on as part of the team after graduation.

title: King Of The Moment (WIP)
description: Online Chess client designed to allow for realtime play, and 'Chess By Mail'.
stack: React, React Router, Node.js, Express, Socket.io, AWS, MongoDB, Chess.js

title: Discord Stats Bot
description: Created a Discord channel bot to track user stats for the video game Apex Legends. User data is presented as a custom image created using HTML canvas and other images. Node.js, Discord.js, Tracker Network API. Deployed on AWS EC2.

title: Pic-Some App
description: This app was a project to create functionality allowing a user to select and add photos to a cart or favorites.
